title: [Portable] LAN Games Repository 3.0.0 [Final]
description:
If you already got [Portable] LAN Games Repository 1.0.0 [Final], you are familiar with the stuff. If not, I suggest you get that first.

Same rules follow for the Support Forum and etc. If not sure, please see my signature from previous torrents.

Quick tips:
Always look for a batch file. If there is one, run the appropriate one (such as- setup.bat, gamesname.bat, stup.bat etc.)
If there is not any batch file, there is nothing to extract.

Here are the games in this release:
Civilization 4 Colonization [Portable].exe
Half-Life 2 Deathmatch.exe
Midnight Club 2 [Portable].exe
Serious Sam the First Encounter [Portable].exe
Serious Sam the Second Encounter [Portable].exe
Soldier of Fortune 2 Double Helix [Portable].exe
Stronghold Crusader Extreme [Portable].exe
SWAT4 [Portable].exe
Team Fortress 2 [Portable].exe
Team Fortress Classic [Portable].exe
Tony Hawks Pro Skater 4 [Portable].exe
Warhammer 40000 Dawn of War [Portable].exe


This one was a "too many games, too little time" situation. So I could not write any instruction for this. But, if you used the first version of the series, you would know how to work these games.
Also, I am not sure how much I will be able to support you guys on these many games. Hopefully, someone will.

Lastly, Happy Camping & Keep Seeding :)
